TaskDescription: Participants viewed negative arousing images from the International Affective Picture System (IAPS) and were asked to rate them for arousal on scale from 1 to 5

session.Description: Session 2: fMRI scanning, pulse oximetry and arousal ratings (48 hours after baseline); Session 3: Online follow-up (2 weeks after baseline)

condition.Description: Describes whether the particular image was cued using TMR for each participant.

response.Description: Represents participant's subjective arousal rating on scale from 1 to 5

item.Description: Each code represents a different image derived from the IAPS database.

baseline.Description: Within Participant Centered Baseline subjective arousal rating
